title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“You came within a hare's breath of being remanded,” Pauley said to Lino, who prosecutors say is a Bonanno family capo. [From the New York Daily News, March 23, 2001. Submitted by Maary-Louise Bean, Guilford, CT.]

Blood flow may be critical to female sexual response, but it's not the whole shebang. [From Modern Maturity, March/April 2001. Submitted by Patrick J. Sullivan, MD, Chicago, Illinois.]
